description:
Shootie`s Janovy was revealed to have evolved from his Tsutarja sometime after Shootie`s and Satoshi battle outside Professor Araragi lab and its reveal to Satoshi and his friends at the Parent Town Battle Club. It`s powerful Cut attack proved to be too much for Pikachu as it defeated him.
During its battle against Satoshi`s Tsutarja, it was revealed to be a male as it was susceptible to its Attract and lost the battle to Satoshi`s Tsutarja due to the effects of Attract.
name: Janovy (Shootie)
